title: Human Resources Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Eisenhower Medical Center (Riverside, CA)
Interview Descriptions: Very pleasant to speak with. Eisenhower is the largest medical provider in the area so it was exciting to interview with them. Salaries are fairly competitive with the rest of the field - plus you have the perk of working with Eisenhower.
Interview Questions: They asked about my technical background and what skills I have developed to help me in my new position.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Eisenhower Medical Center
Interview Descriptions: I applied online on a Tuesday and I got a call for an interview the following Wednesday. It was a panel interview and the interviewers were very kind and understanding.
Interview Questions: Where do you see yourself in 5 years?

title: Patient Registration Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Eisenhower Medical Center
Interview Descriptions: It was long and tedious between phone calls and trying to set up in-person interview, there were 2 managers that needed to coordinate schedules so it took 2 weeks just to get interview.
Interview Questions: what sets me apart from other candidates?

title: Student Worker Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Eisenhower Medical Center in Jan 2022
Interview Descriptions: It was an easy interview. They were nice. Dress professionally- it is much appreciated at this hospital. It was easy to get an interview. I did not het the job, but maybe next time.
Interview Questions: What is your availibilty at this time?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Eisenhower Medical Center (Rancho Mirage, CA) in Sept 2021
Interview Descriptions: Pretty straight forward. Interviewer was very accommodating and I was willing to meet with short notice. Two people were present during the interview and the interview lasted about 15 minutes.
Interview Questions: Asked previous experience that can be applied to current role.

title: Ancillary Secretary Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Eisenhower Medical Center (Rancho Mirage, CA)
Interview Descriptions: Call me to cone in to meey w leadership tream. Met face to face casually. Took skills test ... basic math skills, typing, ms officen, outlook scheduling.    Met w other staff and toured facility. HR called w offer.
Interview Questions: Do you know anything about insurances and if so, what?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 weeks. I interviewed at Eisenhower Medical Center (Rancho Mirage, CA) in Aug 2021
Interview Descriptions: It was ok. I get nervous during interviews so I tend to freeze and get nervous and lose my train of thought but everyone was really nice and made me feel very welcome.
Interview Questions: Where do you see yourself in ten years

title: Certified Medical Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Eisenhower Medical Center (Palm Desert, CA) in Sept 2019
Interview Descriptions: Met with Hiring Specialist. They were very energetic and seemed to enjoy her position. Overall it was very pleasant experience. However the offer was only for $15/ hour and they are not willing to negotiate. It is a take it or leave it deal.  As one of the largest healthcare providers in the valley they are unable to match small healthcare entities.

title: Registered Dietitian Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Eisenhower Medical Center (Palm Springs, CA) in Aug 2019
Interview Descriptions:
Quick and easy the company was great and glass door really helped me find the job it was an easy process that was easy and quick I don’t have much difficulty
Using Glassdoor
Of speaking with the company it all went very smooth and I would use Glassdoor aim for
Sure

title: Financial Services Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Eisenhower Medical Center in Mar 2018
Interview Descriptions:
Online application submission. Phone call from a supervisor within the department. 
In person interview. Started interview 20 mins late. 
3 person group interview. Very friendly. But very misleading. Will request more paperwork, when trying too submit IT WONT LET YOU.
Interview Questions: What qualifies you for this position?

title: Radiologic Technologist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Eisenhower Medical Center (Rancho Mirage, CA) in Apr 2017
Interview Descriptions: Director and lead Tech were prompt, knowledgeable, informative about the department, and welcoming.  I was pleasantly surprised to get to tour the entire department and the various external locations. The staff were very pleasant to meet. I look forward to the chance of employment at EMC.
Interview Questions: How will you handle a situation when asked by a physician to perform task out of scope?

title: Cerified Phlebotomist Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Eisenhower Medical Center (Rancho Mirage, CA)
Interview Descriptions: It was to be interviewed by a supervisor, who enjoyed her job. And was very proud to work for this company. The one on one interview was informative and useful. I received the job and was thrilled to have the job.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to be part of our family?

title: Patient Admitting Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Eisenhower Medical Center (Rancho Mirage, CA) in May 2016
Interview Descriptions: I applied s verla times for the position and after a month I was called in for an interview . Once I was called they asked when I was available to come in and I gave them my next availability and came in for the interview
Interview Questions: How would you handle an upset patient

title: New Grad RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Eisenhower Medical Center (Rancho Mirage, CA) in Jan 2016
Interview Descriptions: Submitted an application online. Received a call from HR about 2 weeks after submission & scheduled an interview. Interview was conducted with three different Unit Directors, 1 Emergency/1 Annenberg 3 South/ 1 Resource Pool. Comfortable environment and questions were geared towards the New Grad RN. Process took close to 2 months.

title: Social Work Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Eisenhower Medical Center
Interview Descriptions: very short and mostly told about myself. They told me about the company and ran through my resume, I was over prepared for the interview. They called me back and asked me to come in to confirm that I wanted to work with them, which they could have told me over the phone. the drive was one hour.

title: RN Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at Eisenhower Medical Center
Interview Descriptions: Excellent! Fair and positive, low stress. Actually enjoyed the interview! Hiring process was streamlined for the most part. Some glitches in HR paperwork but quickly corrected. Campus tour was a nice unexpected treat.

title: Systems Administrator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Eisenhower Medical Center in Mar 2013
Interview Descriptions: First interview by phone; second in person; have not yet heard final results
